title: 91/369/EEC: Commission Decision of 17 July 1991 on the suspension of the buying-in of butter in certain Member States (Only the English, French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 17 July 1991  on the suspension of the buying-in of butter in certain Member States  (Only the English, French and Dutch texts are authentic)  (91/369/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The buying-in of butter by tender provided for in Article 1 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 777/87 is hereby suspended in Belgium, France and Northern Ireland.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium, The French Republic and the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 July 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13. (2) OJ No L 150, 15. 6. 1991, p. 19. (3) OJ No L 78, 20. 3. 1987, p. 10. (4) OJ No L 150, 15. 6. 1991, p. 26. (5) OJ No L 144, 4. 6. 1987, p. 12. (6) OJ No L 185, 11. 7. 1991, p. 5.
